title: the usb C port isn't working consistently
content:
My pixel 2 usb type C port doesn't not hold the cords anymore.
I have tried 4 differen't charing cables, and 2 type c to aux addapters. It will work if the phone is sitting and i don't move the phone once putting it into the port, but once the phone is moved it disconects. I have been late to work 2 times because the charger disconected while sleeping and the phone died. And it is impossible to listen to music while drivig home without discconecting becuse of this issue.. I have the protective plan. and it hasn't been 2 years. ...help!
